scripts.deploy:polygon:vault::predefined: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployVault.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon:vault::v2: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployVaultV2.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon:vault:and::token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployTokenAndVault.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon:vault:token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/token/deployToken.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon:vault:rewards:token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/token/deployRewardsToken.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:local:vault::predefined: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployVault.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:local:vault::v2: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployVaultV2.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:local:vault:and::token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/vault/deployTokenAndVault.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:local:vault:token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/token/deployToken.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:local:vault:rewards:token: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile  && npx hardhat run ./scripts/token/deployRewardsToken.js --network localhost
